abilities.name: Garbotoxin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities (except for Garbotoxin).

attacks.name: Offensive Bomb
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
